column4: so anyone recommend a distro for my eee pc 701sd? LF power + speed. xubuntu freezes too much, ubuntu netbook does also. 10.10 desktop is sluggish but stable. puppy feels week. slytaz is awesome but doesnt pick up my wireless and feels complicated
this is ubuntu only support. for general linux try ##linux
my issue was resolved, now LF oppinion sorry. ubuntu is my favorite, was hoping someone here could relate me an ubuntu remix/similar distro that will run well on older machine
